# CleverDeck
## Spaced repetition flashcards for iOS
[](http://cleverdeck.com/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/cleverdeck-spaced-repetition-flashcards/id881765907?ls=1&mt=8>)
### Learning a language?
CleverDeck includes decks containing 3000 of the most common words in the most popular foreign languages. Cards include translations, transliterations, images, native-speaker audio, and example sentences in both English and the target language. CleverDeck's content was hand-made by [language professionals and teachers.](http://cleverdeck.com/</people/>)

## Features
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cleverdecksite/images/sync-feature.png)
Sync between devices.
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cleverdecksite/images/customize-feature.png)
Customize learning algorithm, notifications, and scheduling.
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cleverdecksite/images/offline-feature.png)
100% functional offline. Cache images and audio before a trip.
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cleverdecksite/images/import-feature.png)
Import flashcard lists.
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cleverdecksite/images/creation-feature.png)
Robust card creation with siblings and three-sided cards.
What is spaced repetition?
Spaced repetition is a method of learning by which you review information at increasingly long intervals. So, for example, I might review something today, then tomorrow, then in four days, then in two weeks. It's a simple idea with incredible results: you end up spending much less time studying while remembering things much better over the long-term. Furthermore, by tracking whether or not you remember things, a spaced repetition system (SRS) can customize review intervals for every individual piece of information - so you spend more time with things you're having trouble learning, and very little time with things you've mastered easily.
What learning algorithms does CleverDeck use?
CleverDeck uses the SM-2 algorithm with a few very minor customizations. This is the same algorithm battle-tested and popularized by other spaced repetition systems such as SuperMemo and Anki. Most of the algorithm's parameters can be customized in the app.
What does CleverDeck cost?
It's free to create and study your own content. Otherwise, it's $3 per month for unlimited access to all our premium decks. There's a freemium that's big enough to let you decide if the premium content is worth paying for. You should cancel if you no longer find the app useful, and I make it really easy to do that.
Will there be an Android version?
As an independent developer, I'm unfortunately very resource-limited and don't have the bandwidth to jump into Android right now. Time or money permitting, I'd love to make an Android version in the near future.

# CleverDeck: Your Language Learning Companion

**Website**: [CleverDeck.com](http://cleverdeck.com)  
**Location**: Istanbul, Turkey  
**Founded**: Y Combinator Batch W12  

### Mission
At its core, CleverDeck is about collaboration and creativity, aiming to commission original artwork from artists to enrich your learning experience. 

### What is CleverDeck?
Originally launched as a customizable spaced repetition flashcard app, CleverDeck is designed to help users learn foreign language vocabulary effectively. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, it now hosts over 3,000 common words across various languages, complemented by images, native speaker audio, and contextual example sentences.

### Key Features
- **Extensive Content**: Access a range of decks for popular languages like Spanish, French, German, Chinese, and more.
- **Adaptive Learning**: CleverDeck employs the SM-2 algorithm for spaced repetition, meaning you'll focus more on words you struggle with and less on those you have mastered.
- **Device Syncing**: Your learning progress is automatically synced between devices.
- **Customization**: Tailor your learning experience by adjusting algorithms, notifications, and scheduling based on your preferences.
- **Offline Functionality**: Download content for use without an internet connection, ideal for trips.
- **Competitive Pricing**: Free access to your own content creation, and a premium for $3/month grants access to all premium decks—enough to see if it’s worth your investment.

### Future Plans
CleverDeck currently has a small team of one—presumably the founder Justin—who openly acknowledges the limitations of resources for developing an Android version. However, there is hope that an Android app will blossom down the line.

### Why Choose CleverDeck?
By marrying innovative technology with expert-sourced content, CleverDeck not only streamlines language acquisition but does so in a way that respects the user's time and investment. Their functional design fosters a unique learning environment where creativity and practicality coexist.

Whether you’re a traveler prepping for your next adventure or someone wanting to enhance your language skills, CleverDeck offers a pathway to effective and enjoyable learning. Go on, check it out—you might just find your new favorite tool!
